title: Did One Direction stop making songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, they went on hiatus in December 2015. Since then they have all been focused on releasing solo material and pursuing other personal projects. There’s currently no end to the “hiatus” in sight, and the members are all signed to different labels. We’ll have to wait and see if they get back together, but I wouldn’t expect it to happen anytime soon.

Yeh …… I guess…… Because, they are on their own path making different kinds of music. So, currently they are working with different ideas and with different producers. Because of that they won’t come back together. Basically they won’t make music together ever again. So that means yes , One Direction did stop making songs……..
Yes, as of right now they are not making music and have gone their separate ways. But it is said that they plan to get together again to make a final album and go for a final tour.

One Direction as a group is currently on a hiatus , meaning that they are not making any songs together. During their time off , each individual member has been making their own songs . Niall - ‘ This Town ‘ & ‘Slow Hands ‘ Harry- ‘Harry Styles (album)’ Liam - ‘ Strip That Down ‘ Louis - ‘ Just Hold On (ft. Steve Aoki)’

the band got broke. now they have began their solo careers after they saw sucess of Zyan (which was 5th memeber earler). Harry styles - sign of time niial horan- this town liyam panye- ( will release soon
Yes. The band broke up quote a while ago and now all four members of the band have released solo songs.
